/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. Buildings line the sides of the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
